name: Nomad (itch) (lefthandedheather)
description:
You play as Nomad, a lizard trying to make his way from the harsh desert to a peaceful oasis. Do your best to keep his temperature under control!

Created as a final project for my Fundamentals of Game Art class at Laguna College of Art and Design

Art and Assets created by Jayson Antido, Max Louis de la Girond'arc, Gwenyth MacDonald, and Dustin Truman

Programming and Level Design by me

Enjoy : )
